patthana3.4:9.1: Noāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:10.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … kamme ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:14.1: Āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:15.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:16.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.4:18.1: Āsavo akusalo dhammo āsavassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:19.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādhipati labbhati), anantare nava … pe … upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi … pe … jhāne tīṇi, magge nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:22.1: Noāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:23.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:31.1: Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.4:32.1: Anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:33.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.4:34.1: Naadhipatiyā dve … pe … naāsevane ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve.
patthana3.4:34.6: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Paccanīyaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … sampayuttavārepi sabbattha dve.)
patthana3.4:38.1: Sāsavo kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.4:39.1: Anāsavo kusalo dhammo anāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:40.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve … pe … nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.4:41.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:44.1: Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:45.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:51.1: Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.4:52.1: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:52.2: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:52.3: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato ca anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.4:53.1: Sāsavaṃ abyākatañca anāsavaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:54.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.4:55.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme … pe … namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.4:60.1: Sāsavo abyākato dhammo sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.4:61.1: Anāsavo abyākato dhammo anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:62.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.4:63.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:70.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:71.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:75.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:76.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.4:77.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalañca āsavavippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:78.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.4:79.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.4:80.1: Āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:81.1: Āsavavippayutto akusalo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.4:82.1: Āsavasampayutto akusalo ca āsavavippayutto akusalo ca dhammā āsavasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:83.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.4:84.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:87.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:88.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:89.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … novigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:91.1: Āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:92.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:93.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:100.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:101.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:107.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:108.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:109.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:110.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:113.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:114.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.4:119.1: Āsavo ceva sāsavoca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:120.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:122.1: Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:126.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:128.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:129.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.4:137.1: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:138.1: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:139.1: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalañca āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.4:140.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:142.1: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.4:143.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.4:146.1: Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:147.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.4:151.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.4:156.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:156.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:157.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.4:163.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.4:164.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:164.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:164.3: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato ca āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.4:165.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākatañca āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:166.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.4:168.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.4:169.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve … pe … napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme navipāke … pe … namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.4:170.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.4:174.1: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:175.1: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:175.2: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:175.3: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa ca āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana3.4:176.1: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.4:177.1: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:177.2: Āsavavippayutto anāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:178.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri … pe … sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.4:180.1: Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.4:184.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
